channel.title: Need to put my server ip On the source
channel.description:
Hi. I was recently making a server. I Downloaded a source and im stuck. I need to put my server onto the source so when i click runserver it means my server is online and can accesss my server via my client or silabsoft. can u tell me what to open... i no this much that i got to open the client. file or the server and search for something and replace it with my server ip.. I hope you understand im not good with englissh :s
Thanks appreciated.

item.title: Need to put my server ip On the source
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Follow stormcutter’s tutorial under the Tutorial Section, on how to make a server. It’s stickied.

Read full topic
